author: Mapleleafbricks
title: 100 Stores minifigure
review:
This exclusive minifigure was released to celebrate 100 LEGO stores in North America. It was available as a gift with purchase on the weekend of January 4-6, 2019 though the Lego companies' Lego stores.

The exclusive features to this set are, a red 2x4 brick printed with the words "100 stores North America", exclusive back torso printing with the same words, a golden backing card as seen in the picture, and a golden poster that looked similar to the backing card.

MaddinBricks
